description: This file defines a helper utility in the Utils namespace with an inline function getRFCConfig, which retrieves RFC configuration parameters using an external getRFCParameter function. It includes licensing information and a include directive for rfcapi.h.

methods.name: bool getRFCConfig(const char * paramName,RFC_ParamData_t & paramOutput)
methods.description: Inline function that retrieves RFC configuration parameters by calling getRFCParameter and returns true if the call was successful or returned a default value, false otherwise.

ctags.name: getRFCConfig
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool getRFCConfig(const char* paramName, RFC_ParamData_t& paramOutput)$/
